thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: Tiffany

author: Tiffany
title: Tiffany
text: I ordered a pair of glasses and sunglasses off of this website. I've seen a lot of good reviews on Firmoo glasses and I was very happy with mine. I had a small discrepancy with one of the pairs I ordered and asked customer service to help me out and they did in a prompt and very friendly and professional fashion. They have affordable and amazing glasses that are quality and I get compliments on the sunglasses I received from them. I totally 100% recommend them and they always have coupons and promotions going on! Very nice to have cute glasses at an affordable price! A+ Firmoo!
